title: Start
body:
<<IdleNPC>> 
Hello my dear dragon friend!
DO u wanna chill here? 
<<HappyNPC>> 
Babboodaba BOO
 
[[Yes|YES]]
[[Maybe|MAYBE]]
[[No|NoChill]]

title: MAYBE
body:
MAYBE??????? U DONT WANNA CHILL??? ARE U CRAZY??üêä
 [[Answer:Node|End]]

title: Let's Make Potion!
body:
<< if $Busy is false>> 
<<quest>> 
Let's make Potion! Bring me 5 Ingridients!
<< endif>>

<< if $Busy is true>> 
You already have a quest
<< endif>>
[[Answer:End|End]]

title: Sell me Potion!Active
body:
<< if $Current is 0 >> 
<<AngryNPC>> << IdlePlayer>> <<$Quest is Potion>>  
You have no Potion
<< endif >>

<< if $Current > 0 and $Current < $Target >>
<< IdlePlayer>> <<AngryNPC>> <<$Quest is Potion>> 
Not enough!
<< endif >>

<< if $Current >= $Target>>
<< HappyNPC>> << HappyPlayer>>  <<success>> 
YEAY!!!!!!
<< endif >>
[[Answer:End|End]]

title: Let's Make Potion!Active
body:
<< $Reward is BasePotion>> << $RewardAmount is 1>>
<< if $Current is 0 >> 
<<AngryNPC>> << IdlePlayer>> <<$Quest is Ingridients>> 
You have no ingredients. You can't make Potion.
<< endif >>

<< if $Current > 0  and  $Current < $Target >>
<< IdlePlayer>> <<AngryNPC>> <<$Quest is Ingridients>> 
Not enough! 
<< endif >>

<< if $Current >= $Target>>
<< HappyNPC>> << HappyPlayer>>  <<success>> 
YEAY!!!!!!
<< endif >>
[[Answer:End|End]]

title: Complete
body:
<< HappyNPC>> << HappyPlayer>> 
I have no more quests for you 
[[Answer:End|End]]
